titles.title: To amend title 11 of the United States Code with respect to the distribution of securities under a plan under chapter 11 of such title.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy law to provide that if a bankruptcy reorganization plan requires the distribution of a security with respect to an allowed claim, then its fair market value shall be conclusively presumed to be equal to the amount of that claim.
